dashboard.empty_step_1: Take a photo or type your crop name

planner.map_instructions_text: Drag boundaries to adjust plot sizes. Click on a plot to select it and view/edit crop assignments.

chat.greeting: Hello! I'm your Niigata farm advisor. How can I help today?

prompts.weather: Tell me about this week's weather and what to watch out for
prompts.frost: Do you think it's going to get cold? Please tell me about Koshihikari countermeasures

fields.search_placeholder: Search by field name or crop...

rotation.same_crop_warning: Same crop planted consecutively. Crop rotation recommended.

prompts.intro: If you have questions, ask anytime
prompts.yield_trend: Show yield trend for Field A

quick_actions.title: Quick Actions

welcome.title: Welcome to ROUVIS
welcome.subtitle: A new way to manage your farm through conversation
welcome.description: ROuvis helps you manage fields, log activities, and plan harvests by chatting with an AI assistant.

benefits.chat: Log and discuss work via chat

success.title: All Set!
success.subtitle: You're ready to start using ROuvis

hero.eyebrow: AI farm operations platform for Japanese growers
hero.title: Built for Japanese farms,
hero.subtitle: ROUVIS unifies weather, work planning, and records so your team can decide today's priorities in minutes, even during peak season.

pain_points.title: Reduce the daily decision burden on farm teams
pain_points.subtitle: Weather shifts, labor limits, and fragmented records are brought into one operating view.

weather.title: Plans break when weather changes
weather.problem: Morning weather changes force last-minute decisions and schedule resets.
weather.solution: ROUVIS auto-suggests task resequencing based on weather and growth stage.

labor.title: Small teams struggle to coordinate
labor.problem: Assigning who does what in which field becomes manual and inconsistent.
labor.solution: Priority-ranked task lists help teams assign work quickly and clearly.

records.title: Records are scattered across tools
records.problem: Paper notes and chats make review and improvement difficult later.
records.solution: All actions and outcomes are saved in one timeline for future decisions.

value_section.title: Four capabilities that improve field execution
value_section.subtitle: The product is designed to reduce operational friction before advanced analytics.

daily_brief.title: Auto-prioritized morning task brief
daily_brief.desc: Get a practical list of what to do today, ordered by urgency and conditions.

field_ai.title: Field-level AI recommendations
field_ai.desc: Receive next-step suggestions tailored by crop, stage, and recent activity.

weather_risk.title: Proactive weather-risk guidance
weather_risk.desc: Get alerts for rain, heat, and cold with suggested schedule adjustments.

traceability.title: Records that drive next-season learning
traceability.desc: Captured logs become reusable operational knowledge for your next cycle.

workflow.title: Simple onboarding in three steps
workflow.subtitle: A mobile-first workflow that teams can adopt quickly.

capture.title: Register fields and crops
capture.desc: Set up your basic farm context once to personalize recommendations.

suggest.title: AI generates daily plans
suggest.desc: Weather and growth stages are used to prepare practical task suggestions.

execute.title: Execute and log in real time
execute.desc: Tap to record completed work and continuously improve recommendation quality.

testimonial.title: What beta users say
testimonial.quote: We spend less time deciding what to do each morning, and we react faster when weather shifts.
testimonial.author: Open-field vegetable grower, Niigata (beta user)

setup.q: Can we run this from smartphones only?
setup.a: Yes. Field registration, task checks, and work logs are all available on mobile.

pricing.a: ROUVIS is currently in closed beta. Pricing and rollout are shared during onboarding.

support.a: Yes. We provide guided setup and operational support to help teams adopt smoothly.

cta.title: Move from reactive farming to reliable operations
cta.subtitle: Join the beta and build an operating model tailored to your crops and fields.

footer.copyright: ¬© 2026 Rouvis. Supporting better farm decisions in Japan.

workflow.module_blueprint_description: Finish initial setup to activate this workflow module.

sections.heading: 1. Introduction
sections.content: Welcome to Rouvis. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you as to how we look after your personal data when you visit our website (regardless of where you visit it from) and tell you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.

sections.heading: 2. Information We Collect
sections.content: We may collect, use, store and transfer different kinds of personal data about you which we have grouped together follows: Identity Data (includes first name, last name, username or similar identifier), Contact Data (includes email address), and Technical Data (includes internet protocol (IP) address, your login data, browser type and version).

sections.heading: 3. How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We will only use your personal data when the law allows us to. Most commonly, we will use your personal data in the following circumstances: Where we need to perform the contract we are about to enter into or have entered into with you. Where it is necessary for our legitimate interests (or those of a third party) and your interests and fundamental rights do not override those interests.

sections.heading: 4. Google User Data
sections.content: Our application accesses Google user data via OAuth authentication. We use this strictly for authentication purposes to allow you to log in to our service. We do not share this data with any third parties or use it for any other purpose.

sections.heading: 5. Data Security
sections.content: We have put in place appropriate security measures to prevent your personal data from being accidentally lost, used or accessed in an unauthorized way, altered or disclosed.

sections.heading: 6. Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our privacy practices, please contact us.

sections.heading: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing and using Rouvis, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. In addition, when using these particular services, you shall be subject to any posted guidelines or rules applicable to such services.

sections.heading: 2. Description of Service
sections.content: Rouvis provides an AI-powered agricultural management platform. You understand and agree that the Service is provided 'AS-IS' and that Rouvis assumes no responsibility for the timeliness, deletion, mis-delivery or failure to store any user communications or personalization settings.

sections.heading: 3. User Conduct
sections.content: You agree to use the Service only for purposes that are legal, proper and in accordance with these Terms and any applicable policies or guidelines. You agree that you will not engage in any activity that interferes with or disrupts the Service or servers or networks connected to the Service.

sections.heading: 4. Termination
sections.content: We may terminate or suspend access to our Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.

sections.heading: 5. Disclaimer of Warranties
sections.content: The sites and the content and services provided via the sites are provided on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis. Rouvis expressly disclaims all warranties of any kind, whether express or implied, including, but not limited to, the implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose and non-infringement.
